item.title: Serverless backend architecture - AWS Cloud Resume
item.description: When you think about serverless architectures in the cloud what exactly comes to mind? If you have not researched more into this topic you would probably think there is a way to run resources without servers because it’s called a server-LESS architecture. Well not necessarily, when I mention a serverless architecture I mean we are building an architecture that requires no server management, we don’t see the server, or manage it.

item.title: Containerizing a web application with Docker
item.description: Have you ever wondered if there was a way to code web applications using Python? Flask is just that, it is a web framework that lets you develop web applications using Python. It also has many nice features like URL routing, template engine, and so on. I will be containerizing my simple Flask web application, you can find the source code of the application code here. This is an extremely simple web application that uses the home.
